ygData.subject: Re: BBC Answers here
ygData.msgSnippet: Robes drop off a necro in a room across from where the Troll SK spawns. There is a long corridor with a couple of rooms through the secret hole in the wall.
ygData.messageBody:
Robes drop off a necro in a room across from where the Troll SK spawns.
There is a long corridor with a couple of rooms through the secret hole in
the wall. The well is also back in this area (which is where you fall from
level 1 should you take the express way down).

-----Original Message-----
From: Chet Watkins [mailto:chet.watkins@...]
Sent: Tuesday, July 06, 1999 9:45 AM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] BBC Answers here


From: "Chet Watkins" <chet.watkins@...>

I have heard it is on a necro spawn in the same hidden room as the SK. Where
you would take a right down the hall to get the SK, you would take a left
and go down the hall opposite of the SK instead. The name of the necro is
the therouligist or something like that. Lately, he has been camped heavier
then the SK.

Adol, 17th Level Paladin of Freeport
---------- Original Text ----------

From: <MFerrulo@...>, on 7/6/99 10:29 AM:

From: MFerrulo@...

In a message dated 7/6/99 8:48:32 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
chet.watkins@... writes:

<<
The 3rd floor Ogre SK. He spawns in the room behind the hidden wall.

Adol, 17th Level Paladin of Freeport
---------- Original Text ----------
>>


Is this string of posts referring to Befallen Dungeon? If so, which mob
and
where drops the Gossimer Robe?

Wizaro
